item.title: Modern Runescape File System
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Davidi2:

It’s just Method is a major contributor to a lot of the development here, I know quite a few people (like Discardedx2 as well) that get advice from him. He just doesn’t visit here enough to get recognition

Discardedx2 feeds off more people than just Method. I give him recognition where recognition is deserved and although the information that I used to reverse engineer my current client wasn’t directly from his mouth, I do keep an eye on MSCD to see if I am close to what he is also researching. I agree, he deserves more credit.

Read full topic

It’d be rude not to include the man. I owe him a lot of respect for giving out the information that got me started in finding the protocol updates.

static final Object[] parseFIT(byte[] chck0, int var1, int var2, Object[] wrapper, byte[] chck1) {
